attributes.action: When The Current PM resigns, Call A General Election To See What The People Want After Blair
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Blair is going. Brown? He is scottish. He is not english. We did not vote for him. We 'sadly' voted for Blair. Now blair is leaving office we should have another general election to see what the people of Britain really want. Sign The petition, sign for change.
